text: seyit’animi sirawochachewini le’inerisu basamerelachewina «zare le’inanite kesewochi ashenafi yelachihumi inemi le’inanite redati nenyi» bale gizemi (asitawisi)፡፡ huletu ch’ifirochimi beteyayu gize፤ wedehwalawi afegefege፡፡ «ine kenanite nits’uhi nenyi፡፡ ine inanite yematayutini ayalehu፡፡ ine alahini iferalehu፡፡ alahimi k’it’ate biritu newi» alachewimi፡፡
